actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to create an independent Office of the Special Counsel.

summary.text: Creates the Office of the Special Counsel (presently within the Merit Systems Protection Board) as an independent establishment in the executive branch. Directs the Special Counsel to submit an annual budget for the Office to the President and the appropriate committees of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to create an independent Office of the Special Counsel.
